sentences.en: A positive pregnancy test soon confirmed her intuitive feelings.
sentences.cn: 阳性孕检结果很快证实了她的直觉。

sentences.en: Are women more intuitive than men?
sentences.cn: 女子比男子的直觉力更强 吗 ?

sentences.en: Decision templates is an intuitive decision level fusion scheme for target recognition.
sentences.cn: 决策模板法是一种直观的决策层融合目标识别方法.

sentences.en: He had an intuitive sense of what the reader wanted.
sentences.cn: 他能直觉地感到读者需要什么。

sentences.en: He seemed to have an intuitive awareness of how I felt.
sentences.cn: 他好像凭直觉就知道我的感受。

sentences.en: He seemed to have an intuitive knowledge of how I was feeling.
sentences.cn: 他好像凭直觉就知道我的感受.

sentences.en: Her perception of the right seemed almost intuitive.
sentences.cn: 她对正确事物的理解几乎是直觉的.

sentences.en: In the intuitive graces she was still crude.
sentences.cn: 她还不太懂如何举手投足,显示本能的优雅举止.

sentences.en: It establishes relationships and analogies utilizing discernment and intuitive analysis.
sentences.cn: 它利用洞察和直觉分析建立起关联和类比.

sentences.en: Our company profits from the team of intuitive employees we have.
sentences.cn: 我们公司得益于有直觉力的员工团队.

sentences.en: She is a very intuitive person.
sentences.cn: 她是个颇有直觉力的人.

sentences.en: Taxonomy is very largely subjective and intuitive.
sentences.cn: 分类学大体上是很主观和直观的.

sentences.en: This arena for exploration has provided remarkable examples of intuitive problem solving.
sentences.cn: 这个探险的舞台,提供了直觉解决问题的非凡实例.

words.tran_cn: 直觉；直觉力；直觉的知识

phrases.tran_cn: n. 良知；直觉的知识，直观知识

trans.tran_cn: 直觉的，凭直觉获知的，直观的
trans.tran_en: an intuitive idea is based on a feeling rather than on knowledge or facts
